buildCommand: pnpm run build.client && pnpm run build.server

headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://em.realscout.com https://widgets.realscout.com https://www.realscout.com https://*.realscout.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://em.realscout.com https://*.realscout.com; img-src 'self' data: https: http: blob: *; font-src 'self' data: https: *; connect-src 'self' https://em.realscout.com https://widgets.realscout.com https://api.realscout.com https://www.realscout.com https://*.realscout.com wss: ws:; frame-src 'self' https://em.realscout.com https://widgets.realscout.com https://*.realscout.com; media-src 'self' https: http:; worker-src 'self' blob:; child-src 'self' blob:;
